markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Voicebox](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2169)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 109 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn necklace

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This box contains small, magical amplifiers that allow a nonverbal character to translate thought into speech, which emits from the necklace. The speech produced matches any language you understand.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Voicebox
